_sText:
CS_MEATLIGHT by Chris (released November 2008)

Back in 2004, when cs_twilight was released, it was quite a success. Several months later, a CSS update replaced ragdoll models and all the old ones were removed. This replacement resulted in an big ERROR message in the map.

CS_MEATLIGHT is a great remake of this fast action, ultra violent map. Chris has made some layout modifications and added a passage through the ventilation system but he kept the spirit of its famous ancestor intact.

The graphic part was also updated to today standard. Numerous custom textures are used and give an original look to this office map.

There are 32 spawn points but it is very enjoyable (and less bloody chaotic) with 8 to 10 players only. A perfect little map for big and perfect frags!

- from map review at Netday.be

Great Thanks to Chris for this Great Remake!

About Playing with Bots: Here is a manually optimized (hand-tuned) and fully place painted NAV-file (Navigation Mesh for playing against the Bots) for this map, because the embedded in .bsp original author's NAV is not fully playable slightly edited auto-gen (in particular bots don't use a ladder between the street and a balcony of office, also don't use a ventilating course from the street deadlock to a corridor of the second floor). Now bots have opportunity to use ALL walkable ways and surely move on ALL space of the map! :-)
